example.name: fire, passive
example.text: Even before those moves added fuel, the fires of discontent had been well stoked *trace* by the highly publicized experience in Japan of one U.S. investor, T. Boone Pickens Jr.
example.arg: the highly publicized experience in Japan of one U.S. investor, T. Boone Pickens Jr

example.name: not fire, active
example.text: Some observers thought that after Friday's sharp drop, the firms would rein in their program traders *trace* to avoid *trace* stoking more controversy.
